attributes.title: Hitman 3 Preview: MUFFIN MURDER - Ep. 216
attributes.description: The crew is back for the first official show of 2021 talking about Respawn's rumored new IP, Outrider's delay, and speculation on why Epic Games bought an old shopping mall. In hands-on Steimer and Britt spent more time with Cyberpunk 2077 and Spiritfarer, Britt finished Hyrule Warriors: Age of Calamity, and Andrea gots hands-on with a demo of Hitman 3.

attributes.title: Pokémon Snap Release Date Revealed! - Ep. 217
attributes.description: This week we're chatting about the Lucasfilm Games news including a new Indiana Jones game from Machine Games and a new Star Wars game from Massive Entertainment. We're joined by special guest, John Drake, VP of Business Development and Licensing for Disney Games, to chat about what these deals mean. Plus Britt reveals she will be hosting the upcoming Resident Evil Showcase where Capcom will debut new gameplay from Village, we analyze the CD Projekt Red apology video, and Pokemon is celebrating their 25th anniversary with lots of news! In hands-on, Britt is playing indie horror game Outbreak: The New Nightmare and Andrea tried the new demo for Monster Hunter Rise while Steimer enjoyed the hot gossip of Netflix's Bridgerton.

attributes.title: Resident Evil Village Gameplay Reveal - Ep. 218
attributes.description: On this week's episode the crew recaps all the news from the Resident Evil Showcase (hosted by Britt!!) included the release date for Village, the reveal of the multiplayer mode, a collab with The Division 2 and more. Plus Pokemon Snap got some new features announced and Dead By Daylight responds to criticisms from its community. In hands-on Andrea and Britt chat about the Maiden demo from Resident Evil Village and Steimer and Britt chat about their time with Hitman 3. Lastly, the Patreon-produced segment is about our gaming routines and turns out: we like snacks.

attributes.title: The Medium Review - Ep.219
attributes.description: This week the Steimbachers are BACK to talk about those big ol' Xbox Game Pass subscription numbers, IO Interactive's success with Hitman 3 and what awaits in Project 007, confirmed locations in Dragon Age 4 and much more! In hands-on Britt talks about her time in The Medium and Steimer is reading a damn good book.

attributes.title: Mass Effect Reactions with Jovenshire! - Ep. 220
attributes.description: This week The Jovenshire joins Andrea, Britt, and Steimer to react to the massive news drop for Mass Effect Legendary Edition, Google shuttering Stadia, and more! In hands-on Joven chats about Magic the Gathering Arena, Andrea tried the new update for The Division 2, and Britt is going full JRPG with the Trails of Cold Steel series. Then we chat with Joven about his new show Dungeons & Dragons show The Stuff of Legends and how he transitioned from content creator to showrunner.

attributes.title: The Last of Us HBO Casting - Ep. 221
attributes.description: This week we're chatting about the first details surrounding E3 2021's digital event, CD Projekt Red got hacked, Pokemon's card shortage and the casting announcements for The Last of Us HBO adaptation. In hands-on Andrea visited The Summit in The Division 2, Steimer tried Story of Seasons: Friends of Mineral Town, and Britt got a first look at Harvest Moon One World.

attributes.title: Nintendo Direct Reactions - Ep. 222
attributes.description: This week we've got 3 amazing guests: returning to the show is G4's Riana Manuel and Spawn on Me's Kahlief Adams while we welcome Gamertag Radio's Parris Lilly for his first appearance to chat about the first Nintendo Direct of 2021 including Smash, Zelda, Splatoon, and more. Then we enter the "Xbox Power Hour" and discuss all the Microsoft news before heading into hands-on. Riana is loving Call of Duty Black Ops Cold War Zombies, Parris is "hate playing" Halo 5, Kahlief & Andrea tried out Amazon Luna, and Britt clawed her way around Bowser's Fury and Super Mario 3D World. Lastly, in honor of Black History Month, the panel discusses what the celebration means to them, the challenges of being a black content creator online, and the importance of education and activism with their platforms...and yes, the oatmeal raisin cookie debate rages on.

attributes.title: Final Fantasy VII Remake: Intergrade Announced - Ep. 223
attributes.description: Sony had a new State of Play where they debuted a first look at a new episode for Final Fantasy VII Remake along with graphics upgrades for the PS5 version coming this year! We recapped the rest of the announcements and dove into the shuttering of Anthem at Bioware but the good news that they can make Dragon Age a single-player game. In hands-on Britt went retro with Ghosts and Goblins Resurrected, Andrea tried the Outriders demo and Call of Duty Black Ops Cold War Zombies. Lastly, they chat about which RPG elements they would like to see permanently kicked to the curb in this month's Patreon produced segment.

attributes.title: Pokémon Legends Arceus & New Switch Model?! - Ep. 224
attributes.description: This week we're joined by Christian Spicer, host of the DLC podcast, the Official The Last of Us podcast, and creator of CONSEQUENCES comic book. We chat about the massive dump of Pokemon news, the new Nintendo Switch hardware reports, PSVR games, and more. In hands-on Britt and Steimer have been playing Story of Seasons: Pioneers of Olive Town, Christian checked out the Outriders demo, Britt played It Takes Two, and Andrea reports in on the newly revealed Aliens: Fireteam. In our feature segment we chat with Christian about launching his Kickstarter for his comic book, what it was like working on The Last of Us podcast, and more.

attributes.title: Microsoft Sheds Light on Bethesda Exclusivity - Ep. 225
attributes.description: This week The Steimbachers are back to talk about the latest information on Xbox/Bethesda exclusivity, what Square Enix could be plotting for next week's digital showcase, their updated thoughts on Story of Seasons: Pioneers of Olive Town and more!

attributes.title: PlayStation “VR2” Controllers Revealed: HAND THONGS?! – Ep. 226
attributes.description: This week The Steimbachers are back again to talk ALL things Life is Strange: True Colors, the Square Enix digital showcase, those PlayStation VR controllers plus MORE moves being made by PlayStation, the latest and greatest with Xbox Game Pass, that Dying Light 2 update and more!

attributes.title: New Nintendo Switch Rumors – Ep. 227
attributes.description: This week Britt and Steimer chit-chat about certain PlayStation storefronts potentially disappearing, the rumor of Microsoft buying Discord, speculate about the “new” Nintendo Switch and just WHAT Nintendo has up their sleeve and more! Britt has been digging her time in It Takes Two and Steimer is having a literal blast in Outriders!

attributes.title: PlayStation Shuts Down PS3, Vita Store - Ep. 228
attributes.description: This week Andrea returns to join Britt and Steimer to chat about the PlayStation store rumor that came true as Sony shut downs the storefront for PS3, Vita, and PSP permanently. They also chat about PAX East being canceled, Xbox's backwards compatibility xCloud program, and the fancy new Bang & Olufsen headphones. In hands-on Andrea and Britt are hanging out in Cozy Grove on their spooky islands and Steimer revisited Marvel's Avengers to checkout the new Hawkeye DLC. Lastly, in the Patreon produced segment they discuss women's representation in video games, how far it has come and where it still needs to go.

attributes.title: Outriders Hands-On Impressions w/ Riana Manuel - Ep. 229
attributes.description: Andrea and Steimer are joined by Riana Manuel to chat about E3 2021's digital event, Pac-Man 99, new Mass Effect Legendary Edition details, MLB The Show coming to Xbox Game Pass and more! In hands-on they chat about their time playing People Can Fly's new co-op sci-fi shooter Outriders.

attributes.title: Resident Evil New Trailer & Demo Info - Ep. 230
attributes.description: This week the crew is back together to recap the new Resident Evil Showcase including the new trailer, demo info, first look at the Netflix series Infinite Darkness and Resident Evil 4 returns in VR on Oculus Quest 2. Please they chat about the Nintendo Indie World event and the updates for PS5. In hands-on they delve deeper into their time with Outriders while Steimer and Andrea chat about why they are leaving Animal Crossing New Horizons behind...j/k ANDREA WILL NEVER LEAVE.

attributes.title: Resident Evil Village First Demo Impressions - Ep. 231
attributes.description: This week the crew is chatting about the winners of the DICE Awards 2021, Resident Evil Village's first demo and another look at Resident Evil 4 VR, PlayStation is teaming up with Firewalk for a new AAA multiplayer game, and we've got our first hint at what's next for the Battlefield franchise. In hands-on, Britt spent some time with her husbandos of Judgement Remastered, Andrea & Steimer have been playing more Outriders, Britt got her zombie on with Stubbs the Zombie Remastered and the Resident Evil Village demo, and Steimer is super into the new season of The Circle.

attributes.title: Xbox and PlayStation Celebrate Record Breaking Wins – Ep. 232
attributes.description: This week Riana Manuel joins Britt, Steimer and Andrea to chat about PlayStation and Xbox CRUSHING it (meanwhile you can buy a golden Wii for $300,000), Ri gushes about Apex Legend’s Arena Mode, Britt gives a few updates on Resident Evil Village and the ladies scratch their heads at the thought of an “esports certification exam.” Hands-on includes Ri’s time with Apex Legends, Steimer’s latest adventures in Animal Crossing and their thoughts on the new Mortal Kombat film. The third segment is about how Cyberpunk 2077 has impacted the way we look at pre-release cycles.

attributes.title: Resident Evil Village Review - Ep. 233
attributes.description: This week we recap what's happening with the Epic Games vs Apple trial, including some "leaks" about Sony and cross-play. In hands-on Britt and Steimer tested out their photographer skills in Pokémon Snap, while Andrea and Britt deep dive, spoiler-free, into their playthroughs of Resident Evil Village.

attributes.title: Pokemon Snap and Alexa Ray Corriea - Ep. 234
attributes.description: This week WGG alum Alexa Ray Corriea joins Andrea for a discussion on the earnings reports for EA & Ubisoft, E3 2021 announcements on who is and isn't participating, an update on the Epic v Apple trial and more. In hands-on Andrea finally gets to talk about her time so far with Mass Effect Legendary Edition and it would be an Alexa Ray guest appearance with talk of Pokemon. Lastly, Alexa takes your questions about her upcoming game Aztech: Forgotten Gods, working in video game writing,  and what's she playing.

attributes.title: Mass Effect MP Might Return?! - Ep. 235
attributes.description: This week Andrea and Steimer discuss GTA 5 coming to next-gen, Call of Duty's 80's action heroes, and rumored Mass Effect 3 multiplayer making a return. In hands-on Steimer chats about her run in Mass Effect Legendary Edition while Andrea previews Knockout City with her exclusive gameplay and a hands-off preview of Deathloop.
